resources.string: Get the basic to advanced Android tutorials along with full source code at Gadget Creek!
Our community will help you learn the best tricks, tips and life hacks for absolutely everything!
Read the latest technology news and tech headlines on computer, apps, games, gadgets and other personal tech!

There are two steps to see the Intro Screen slider.

1. Goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data.
2. Click the below Play Again button
